ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Speaking of lower levels...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yep.  Me too.  Innoruuk the price is maybe 1pp per AC if you re lucky.  100pp for a full set, again if you re lucky.  Not worth my time anymore.  If it
ygData.messageBody:
"Reeves, Patrick W" wrote:

> As a Master Smith on the Karana server it is just not worth my time or
> effort to make and sell Banded anymore. As most people are not willing to
> pay enough to make it worth while. That combined with too many flakey
> customers, last 2 people who wanted a complete set flaked on me after I had
> made it, have led me to stop making banded for sale. The only time I make
> it now is for friends that need it.
>
> Rokenn

Yep. Me too. Innoruuk the price is maybe 1pp per AC if you're lucky. 100pp for a full set, again if
you're lucky. Not worth my time anymore. If it ever really was. I'd be level 50 now if I hadn't stopped
and doing Smithing for awhile, and I'd have a lot more cash now, too.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 47.98 songs, Innoruuk

Died 7 times in PoH on Saturday, but got me some booties on the last Scorn Banshee drop of the night.
Stayed even on exp, too!
